name: Angel, Archangel Iilari’Jil
damage_immunities: radiant; nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned, prone, unconscious

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Radiant Fists or Radiant Blast attacks.

actions.name: Radiant Fists
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 25 (5d6+8) bludgeoning damage + 27 (6d8) radiant.

actions.name: Radiant Blast
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +13 to hit, 150 ft., one target, 28 (5d8+6) radiant + 14 (4d6) fire.

legendary_actions.name: Fly
legendary_actions.desc: Up to half their flying speed with o provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Celestial Shield (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Creates a shield of radiance around a creature of their choice within 30' of them. The target’s AC increases by 4 until the start of Iilari’jil’s next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Restore Vigor (3)
legendary_actions.desc: Ends blinded charmed deafened paralyzed petrified or poisoned conditions on all they choose within 15 ft..

legendary_actions.name: Revive (3)
legendary_actions.desc: Returns creature they can see within 30' of them to life with 10 (3d6) hp if target has been dead no longer than 1 min.

special_abilities.name: Angelic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: Its weapon attacks are magical. When they hit with any weapon deals an extra 6d8 radiant (included below).

special_abilities.name: Divine Awareness
special_abilities.desc: Iilari’jil knows if it hears a lie.

special_abilities.name: Immortal Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require food drink or sleep

special_abilities.name: Turn the Tide (Recharge 6)
special_abilities.desc: Carpet of golden flame erupts from ground on a point they can see within 120' of them. Each hostile creature within 20' of the point: 56 (16d6) radiant (DC 21 Dex half). Each friendly creature within 20' of the point regains 28 (8d6) hp.

special_abilities.name: Rouse to Action (5/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Inspires up to 4 creatures they can see within 60' of them. For 1 min when target makes ability check attack roll or save can add a d6 to roll provided it can see or hear Iilari’jil. Creature can benefit from Rouse to Action die only once per turn.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: Cha (DC 21) no material components: At will: command guidance heroism true strike3/day ea: haste plane shift
